name: sis
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
informal a sister: Solange Knowles is Beyoncé's little sis. Sally pinched her brother. "Thanks, sis. I needed that."
mainly US, informal used when talking to a female friend: Way to go, sis!
More examplesFewer examplesIt's not often we have my big sis with us. I think we could pass for bro and sis as we look alike in some ways.Hey sis! What's up?
